dcterms:description: A database of n-grams of sequences of up to 5 words that records the frequency distribution of each unit in each year from 1500 onwards, used for deriving lexical transition probabilities and grammar checking.
dcterms:title: Google Books N-gram Corpus

dcterms:description: A corpus of essays in Spanish written by non-native speakers with different levels of proficiency, used for testing grammar checking algorithms.
dcterms:title: CEDEL2 corpus
